message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm happy to pay $9,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is unfortunately a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250? I'm confident you'll still get a great deal for the product at this price.
Alice, I understand your position, but $10,250 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $10,000 for the product.  This is my final offer, as I'm also considering other options.
